backend/main.mo: Main backend actor that includes the MixinStorage module from blob-storage, providing blob storage functionality.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting two completed features: increasing the Ghostbusters logo size in Layout.tsx and updating the investigations count from '50+' to '25+' in Home.tsx.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of frontend files describing the paranormal investigation app's components, pages, hooks, and styling with Ghostbusters theme and Oklahoma focus.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining CSS custom properties for light and dark themes using OKLCH color space with minimal color values (mostly grayscale).
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with title 'Oklahoma Paranormal Investigations - Spectral Investigations' and root div for React mounting.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component configuring TanStack Router with home and resources routes, wrapped in ThemeProvider and QueryClientProvider with Toaster for notifications.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Layout component with sticky header featuring h-20 Ghostbusters logo, navigation links (Home, Resources), theme toggle button, and mobile menu support.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and manages backend actor instances with optional Internet Identity authentication, invalidating dependent queries on actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context provider and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login state, identity persistence, and AuthClient lifecycle with configurable options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty file intended for custom React Query hooks for authenticated backend operations.
frontend/src/index.css: Comprehensive Tailwind styles with OKLCH-based paranormal theme colors (ethereal, midnight, spectral, phantom), custom glow utilities, and Playfair Display/Inter font imports.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React application entry point rendering App within InternetIdentityProvider and QueryClientProvider wrappers.
frontend/src/pages/CaseDetail.tsx: Empty file intended for detailed case view page with authentication requirements.
frontend/src/pages/CaseGallery.tsx: Empty file intended for case gallery page displaying user-submitted cases with authentication.
frontend/src/pages/Home.tsx: Home page component featuring hero section with background image, services cards (apparitions, sounds, objects, EMF), features section, stats display, and CTA sections for case submission and resources.
frontend/src/pages/Resources.tsx: Resources page displaying paranormal phenomena types, investigation equipment details, documentation guidelines, and safety precautions organized in tabs and cards.
frontend/src/pages/SubmitCase.tsx: Empty file placeholder for case submission page component.
frontend/src/pages/Team.tsx: Empty file placeholder for team page component.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom color scheme (ethereal, midnight, spectral, phantom), extended shadows (glow effects), custom fonts (Playfair Display, Inter), and animations for paranormal theme.
project_state.json: Project state tracking document listing implemented features (home page, case submission form, gallery, resources), architectural notes (Oklahoma-only service, founded 2025), and feature version history.
